Detailed Description

Banner ad.

Author:
2009-2014 Flurry, Inc. All Rights Reserved

Banner ad object. Used to display Banner ads.

See also:
Flurry Publisher Support Site for more information

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FlurryAdBanner ( Context  context,
ViewGroup  viewGroup,
String  adSpace 
)

Create an instance of FlurryAdBanner.

Create an instance of FlurryAdBanner.

Parameters:
context The current activity context.
viewGroup The viewGroup to place the banner ad in.
adSpace The placement of the ad within your app. For example, for a splash screen ad, it might be named "SPLASH_SCREEN"
Returns:
An instance of FlurryAdBanner.

Member Function Documentation

void destroy (  ) 

Destroy the ad object.

Destroys the ad object and releases all associated resources.

void displayAd (  ) 

Display the ad.

Displays the ad, if ready. This method should be used in conjunction with the ad listener.

void fetchAd (  ) 

Fetch and prepare an ad for display.

Fetches and prepares an ad for display. This method should be used in conjunction with the ad listener.

void fetchAndDisplayAd (  ) 

Fetch and display the ad.

boolean isReady (  ) 

Indicates whether or not the ad is ready for display.

Indicates whether or not the ad is ready for display.

Returns:
true if the ad is ready for display, false if not.
void setListener ( FlurryAdBannerListener  listener  ) 

Set the ad listener.

Set the lister for asynchronous ad serving. The listener is an interface which can be implemented to receive notification of various events associated with this ad.

Parameters:
listener Your implementation of the ad listener.
void setTargeting ( FlurryAdTargeting  targeting  ) 

Set the ad targeting.

Set the targeting for this ad. Targeting allows partners to supply information they track internally, which is not available to Flurry's targeting system. If the targeting settings are matched on the ad server, a subset of targeted ads will be delivered to the user.

Parameters:
targeting The ad targeting.
